text: Hélène Martini (6 August 1924 - 5 August 2017) was a French nightclub owner. He was known for her ownership with the Folies Bergères and known as The Empress of the Night. She was born in Warsaw, Poland to French parents. Martini died on 5 August 2017 in Paris at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2017 deaths Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Warsaw
title: Hélène Martini
